name: Vreal
detailed_description:
Vreal is the first broadcast platform for VR entertainment. Wanna chat with us about VR? Join our Discord: http://www.discord.gg/vreal

Vreal supports the following VR games:
  • Tilt Brush
  • Blocks
  • GORN
  • SUPERHOT VR
  • Fantastic Contraption
  • Hot Dogs, Horseshoes, and Hand Grenades

We will add support for more VR games throughout Early Access.

Features:
  • Create your own native VR recordings from Tilt Brush, Blocks, GORN, SUPERHOT, Fantastic Contraption, and Hot Dogs, Horseshoes, and Hand Grenades and watch them back in VR with friends.
  • Watch VR recordings with up to four friends on HTC Vive and Oculus Rift, from anywhere inside a game world.
  • Hang out, chat, and draw inside native VR recordings.
  • Need to grab a snack? Pause the recording!
  • Choose a fun avatar and take selfies in VR with your friends!
  • Use virtual cameras inside VR to create fun videos to share!

short_description: Vreal is the first broadcast platform for VR games; create and watch VR game content all within VR. Party up with friends and explore VR gameplay together, all from your own perspectives. Vreal is now in Early Access; try us for free! A VR headset is required to use Vreal.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
